# dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
var: []  # a suffix variable
dyn{{ identifier }}:
  description: a dynamic family
  dynamic:
    variable: _.var
  var: val  # a variable inside dynamic family
```

## a dynamic family

`standard`


This family builds families dynamically.
